sources.title: Mom Is That You?! (2023)
sources.description: Akio Kizaki who spends his days as head of the Human Resources Department of a large company is nervous about his wife's divorce and concerned about the relationship with his daughter, who is now a university student. To relax, he decides to visit my parent's house in the center of Tokyo. (Source: FilmAffinity)

metadata.Plot: Akio, an HR worker, visits his transformed mother Fukue in Tokyo. Baffled by her new lively self, he encounters a friendly neighbor. Through these interactions, Akio gains new perspectives, noticing overlooked aspects of life.
metadata.Writer: Yûzô Asahara, Ai Nagai, Yôji Yamada
metadata.Actors: Sayuri Yoshinaga, Yô Ôizumi, Mei Nagano
